content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the negotiation about the rental price of an apartment in München.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price?Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] The final price was not agreed upon. The landlord's last offer was 750 Euro per month, but I felt it was still too high for me.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I did not achieve the outcome I wanted, so I would rate my satisfaction level as 1.
name: Haoyu Wang
